text: @realDonaldTrump Can you and your family please volunteer on the front lines of this coronavirus, but please do not wear any masks or personal protective gear, take the risk let’s see if you and your family can get infected, do it for us, the stock market will rally I promise you #tvratingswhore

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
